channel.title: Git on Keep Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Keep Learning

item.title: Git Notes
item.description: Git Notes Git的用途和优点自行Google。这里安利一些学习资料，本Notes主要来自于廖雪峰的Git教程： Git的官方网站：http://git-scm.com 廖雪峰的Git教程：https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/896043488029600 Git的cheat sheet：https://gitee.com/liaoxuefeng/learn-java/raw/master/teach/git-cheatsheet.pdf Cheat Sheet Git Cheat Sheet git initcreate a new local respository git clone git@github.com:user/repo.gitclone an existing repository use SSH git clone https://github.com/user/repo.gitclone …… use HTTPS git statusstatus of your working directory git diffchanges to tracked files git add readme.
